home.labelSkill: I am looking for following skills

info.copyright:
JNet Quality Consulting GmbH
All rights reserved
info.description:
Each of us has special abilities - skills. Some would like to develop them, some would like to help others to develop them.

In skillvents organizers find participants and vice versa. Anyone can create skillvents and thus, for example, pass on their talent for rolling sushi to others.

skillvents is not only free of charge, you can even earn money. Build up your community, organize great skillvents that are fun, expand your level of awareness. If participants are willing to pay for your skillvent, you can use your PayPal account to set up fee-based skillvents. The payment of the participants, minus our fee of 20%, ends up directly and immediately on your PayPal account.
info.feedbackUploadSuccess:
Thank you, your feedback has successfully been sent.

info.infoOther: You are {0} and you use app version ${appVersion}
info.link2blog: More about this in our blog
info.promoSender: This link is you sent by {0}
info.socialShareBrowser: Invite your friends via email or chat. We prepared a text, which you may copy & paste:
info.socialShareText:
Hey, I'm in ${appTitle} because of Bluetooth Matching, Guides, and Events 😎

It's fun strolling through the city and the app suggest Buddies with similar interests in your immediate vicinity! 😊

Wanna try it? ✌️😏
You'll find me in ${appTitle} as {0} {1}
info.url: Link for sending in other Apps like WhatsApp:

intro.bluetooth:
• If you open ${appTitle}, Bluetooth Matching scans your immediate surrounding for Buddies with similar interests. If there is a match, you will receive a message
  • There are many other ways in which we match, e.g. when a Buddy with the same interests looks at a location that you have saved as a favorite
  • Additionally Guide show Buddies with similar interests their view of your city
intro.bluetoothDescriptionBrowser: As soon as you have installed the app, you can find Buddies with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching. The browser doesn't support Bluetooth.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionLoggedOff: Log in to find Buddies with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionOff: Your Bluetooth is turned off. Activate it to start Bluetooth matching.
intro.chatDescription: After logging in, you will see the list of Buddies with whom you have already chatted.
intro.chatEmpty: You don't have started any chats with other Buddies yet. Click on Chat in a Buddies's profile.
intro.contactFavorite: Here you can send friend requests or block other Buddies.
intro.contacts:
We match Buddies according to the following criteria, which you can specify in your settings:
  • Skills
  • Age
  • Gender
  • favorite Locations
Hence, we may suggest fitting skillvents for you and you may search the community for other Buddies with similar skills.
intro.description:
More spontaneity needed? For example if:
  • You want to do something, but your friends don't have time
  • You are in another city and like to meet like minded
  • You enjoy organizing events where new Buddies are welcome to join
skillvents is the right app for you in such cases.
intro.detail:
The detail page contains
  • contact data
  • describtion of the location
  • reachability of the location
  • map
  • various buttons to e.g. add locations to your favorites.
intro.eventNew:
• Choose a location (list above)
  • Location doesn't exist? Click enter Location
  • In the Location click Events at the bottom
  • Click Add new Event
intro.events:
Here they are, skillvents you take part as well as the ones you created.

We also suggest you interessting and fitting skillvents, so that you constantly develop more skills and never run out of excitment.
intro.goToSettings:
Let's create your profile so that you can also get good matches here.
Clicking on the profile icon will take you to your profile.
intro.goToSettings2: A swipe to the left and you can enter attributes about yourself and locations.
intro.home:
Sometimes you want to get out of the rut and discover new things. ${appTitle} helps
  • to match contacts with same interests, e.g. dog lovers or concert goers
  • to find new locations/events through Guides
We do it in the following way...
intro.homeImage: Add your profile picture, a short self-description and other information here.
intro.homeLocation:
Enter new locations... advantages:
  • as soon as a Buddy clicks your location and fits to you, you receive a note and may get in contact
  • You will be informed about all events in your location

You see, it's worth it! Examples for locations:
  • a nice sight in the mountains
  • starting point of a cool bike tour
  • a new restaurant/museum
intro.listExplained:
Lists consist of the picture, information and the butterfly with
  • distance information including compass
  • category
  • favorite status
  • rating
By clicking the butterfly, you can rate the entry.
intro.listFilter:
Lists may be filtered by
  • categories
  • cardinal directions
  • districts
In contrast to the search, in which new data is fetched from the server, the filter only acts on the list elements that have already been loaded.
intro.listMenu:
The app follows these concepts
  • on the bottom you find the menu including Locations, Buddies, Search and What's up? (as soon as you are logged in, you see all of them)
  • Clicking on one of the menu items opens the submenu
intro.locations: Many cool locations already exist. Those that do not yet exist, e.g. your insider tips, may be created easily and events can be added with just a few clicks.
intro.menuOpen: You are back to the list. Click here to re-open the menu.
intro.notification: Here you will see your notifications, e.g. confirmations to your events.
intro.notificationEmpty: You do not have any notifications, yet.
intro.position: Here you can choose your location. For example, if you plan to be in another city tomorrow and want to see what's going on there, you select the city here and your location will be virtually moved there.
intro.register: After registration, we will show you how you can individualize your profile. Thank you for taking the time for this intro.
intro.settings:
Here you describe yourself and what you like. Based on this information we match:
  • Locations
  • Events
  • and Buddies
intro.settingsLoggedIn:
• Change your profile image and enter general information here
  • Swipe left to enter attributes that describe you and that you like about other Buddies
  • provide yourself as a guide for Buddies fitting your settings
intro.whatToDo:
You can easily enter what you would like to do today, e.g. go out for dinner or visit a museum, etc.

The activity will be presented to Buddies who suit you and are no further than 50 KM away.

locations.asMessage: I want to go there at {0}
locations.bonusHintEdit: Describe what you offer your customers in case of an immediate review, for example, an espresso or discount on the purchase just made. Your customer then shows you the confirmation page on his mobile, than you give him the bonus. Customers can redeem this bonus only once a week, because you can evaluate a Location week only once. Of course, your location is particularly emphasized in the ${appTitle} lists

login.changePasswordBody: There must be at least 8 characters long. To please, for your own safety, not a trivial password.

login.failedToSetCreds: Automatic login could not be set due to your browser settings. Possibly your browser is currently running in private mode.
login.hints:
As a registered user you can
  • see and chat with Buddies
  • find Buddies with similar interests within your immediate surrounding with Bluetooth Matching
  • find Guides or offer yourself as a guide
  • add locations to your favorites and receive notifications when Buddies, who suit you, are also interested in the location
  • participate in events or post your own
  • and much more
login.legal: I have read the Data Protecttion, Terms and Conditions, understand and accept them.
login.recoverPasswordBody: An email has been sent. With their help, you can login again.
login.recoverPasswordErrorEmail: Your information is incorrect. Note that all the fields must correspond to those, as you have entered with us.
login.recoverPasswordErrorSpam: The function was called too many times.
login.recoverPasswordErrorTime: You have already requested the reset. Please confirm this one first.
login.title: Login

settings.bdayNotBorn: Sorry, you're not even in the world. Only already born Buddies can register here in ${appTitle}.
settings.bdayTooOld: Are you actually already {1}? Respect, get in touch with us by phone and we will help with ${appTitle}. However, for the auto-enrollment you may not be older than {0}. In case your age is correct, you may make yourself a few years younger here on ${appTitle}. In real life, that's unfortunately not possible so far.
settings.bdayTooOld2: Wow, now you have managed {1} years in your life, and now this stupid computer program tells you that you are not allowed to sign up. Respect, get in touch with us by phone and we will help with ${appTitle}. However, for the auto-enrollment you may not be older than {0}, sorry!
settings.bdayTooYoung: You are only {1} years, which is too young for ${appTitle}. The minimum age is {0} years.
settings.bdayUsingInterrestedIn: "Prefered from" may only be used, when you enter your own birthday.
settings.bluetoothCheckbox: activate matching to find like minded nearby
settings.deleteExplain: Please write us a few more words so that we can improve.
settings.deleteExplainMoreWords: 3 words or even more would be nice.
settings.deleteProfileHint: Your data will be deleted forever after this confirmation. We only keep the reason for your deletion so that we can hopefully constantly improve. Please choose at least one reason:
settings.deleteReason6: don't understand the usefulness of the app
settings.genderUsingInterrestedIn: "Prefered from" may only be used, when you enter your own gender.
settings.hintDeleteReason1: The app is brand new, can't you give us a few more months?
settings.hintDeleteReason2: With valuable input from you we can make the app easier. Would you like to support us?
settings.hintDeleteReason3: In the notifications above you can turn off specific notifications.
settings.hintDeleteReason4: If you report exactly these contacts to us, we can specifically write to them and warn them to block them if necessary. No reason to leave, is there?
settings.hintDeleteReason5: We're sorry, did our marketing give the wrong impression?
settings.hintDeleteReason6: We want to connect you to contacts with similar interest, no matter where you are in the world. No dating, no sex, life is so much more than just superficiality.
settings.hintDeleteReason7: Would you like to tell us what brought you here anyway?
settings.noAGB: Please accept our terms and conditions.
settings.passwordWrong: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
